Package ch.idsia.crema.factor.credal.linear

Class SeparateHalfspaceFactor

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.idsia.crema.factor.credal.linear.SeparateFactor<SeparateHalfspaceFactor>
      • ch.idsia.crema.factor.credal.linear.SeparateHalfspaceFactor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LinearFactor, SeparateLinearFactor<SeparateHalfspaceFactor>, SeparatelySpecified<SeparateHalfspaceFactor>, GenericFactor
    public class SeparateHalfspaceFactor
extends SeparateFactor<SeparateHalfspaceFactor>
implements SeparateLinearFactor<SeparateHalfspaceFactor>
    A separately specified Credal factor that has a list of linear constrains for each separation.
    Author:
    huber

      • filter

        public SeparateHalfspaceFactor filter​(int variable,
                                      int state)
        Filter the factor by setting a specific variable to a state. This only works when the var is in the grouping/separated part.

        Note that the constraits sets are not copied. So changing this factor will update also the filtered one.

        Specified by:
        filter in interface SeparatelySpecified<SeparateHalfspaceFactor>
        Parameters:
        variable -
        state -
        Returns:

      • deterministic

        public static SeparateHalfspaceFactor deterministic​(Strides left,
                                                    Strides right,
                                                    int... assignments)
        Static method that builds a deterministic factor (values can only be ones or zeros). Thus, children variables are determined by the values of the parents
        Parameters:
        left - Strides - children variables.
        right - Strides - parent variables
        assignments - assignments of each combination of the parent
        Returns:

      • deterministic

        public static SeparateHalfspaceFactor deterministic​(Strides left,
                                                    int assignment)
        Static method that builds a deterministic factor (values can only be ones or zeros) without parent variables.
        Parameters:
        left - Strides - children variables.
        assignment - int - single value to assign
        Returns:
